GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: This file contains the metadata, events, and data for REDCap project "Delphi-FT template round 2".

redcap:Surveys.title: "Insert here the title of your study": a fast-track Delphi process (e-questionnaire for step 2)
redcap:Surveys.instructions:
You may already have taken part in the first step of this fast-track Delphi process, in the form of a brainstorming session according to an adapted version of the nominal group technique on MM.DD, and we thank you for that.

This questionnaire is the second step of this fast-track Delphi process. It contains XX statements and questions divided into X sections. It should take you between XX and XX minutes to complete.

If needed, you can always go back to the previous page. Please leave your comments at the end of each statement, in case you want to qualify or justify your answer. You can also suggest additional statements or ask questions at the end of each section. Your answers will be treated with strict confidentiality.

If you are not familiar with certain aspects of the topic, you can always refer to the key documents sent to you by e-mail.

In case of technical problems or any other question related to the project, please do not hesitate to contact us at xxx.xxx@xxx.xx.

We thank you in advance!
redcap:Surveys.acknowledgement:
Thank you very much for completing this questionnaire.

Your answers will now be analyzed according to strict confidentiality criteria. In a few days you will receive a new link to the questionnaire of the 3rd step of this fast-track Delphi process.

In the meantime, if you have any questions about the project, please do not hesitate to contact us at xxx.xxx@xxx.xx.

We wish you a very nice day!
redcap:Surveys.response_limit_custom_text: Thank you for your interest; however, the survey is closed because the maximum number of responses has been reached.

ItemGroupDef.Name: This section aims to capture the characteristics that are essential to the description of our panel of experts/participants.

PREAMBLE
Statement 1: "Insert here a type-1 question (format: affirmative statement)."
Please indicate your level of agreement with the statement, on a scale from 1 (= total disagreement) to 9 (= total agreement).

SECTION A: "Insert here the title of your section A"
This section of the e-questionnaire contains statements related to XXX.
Statement 4: "Insert here a type-1 question (format: affirmative statement)."
Please indicate your level of agreement with the statement, on a scale from 1 (= total disagreement) to 9 (= total agreement).

Statement 5: "Insert here a type-1 question (format: affirmative statement)."

SECTION B: "Insert here the title of your section B"
This section of the e-questionnaire contains statements related to XXX.
Statement 10: "Insert here a type-1 question (format: affirmative statement)."
Please indicate your level of agreement with the statement, on a scale from 1 (= total disagreement) to 9 (= total agreement).

Statement 11: "Insert here a type-1 question (format: affirmative statement)."
Please indicate your level of agreement with the statement, on a scale from 1 (= total disagreement) to 9 (= total agreement).

SECTION C: "Insert here the title of your section C"
This section of the e-questionnaire contains statements related to XXX.
Statement 16: "Insert here a type-1 question (format: affirmative statement)."
Please indicate your level of agreement with the statement, on a scale from 1 (= total disagreement) to 9 (= total agreement).

Statement 17: "Insert here a type-1 question (format: affirmative statement)."
Please indicate your level of agreement with the statement, on a scale from 1 (= total disagreement) to 9 (= total agreement).

Question.TranslatedText: Record ID

ItemDef.Name: dft2_0_gender
ItemDef.redcap:SectionHeader: This section aims to capture the characteristics that are essential to the description of our panel of experts/participants.

Question.TranslatedText: Please select your gender:
Please select the area that best describes your occupation:
Please specify your answer:
Please indicate the geographical area in which you carry out your (main) professional activity:

ItemDef.Name: dft2_0_email
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: This field will be used to create individual and confidential result reports for the 3rd step of the process.

Question.TranslatedText: Please indicate your email:

ItemDef.Name: dft2_0_conflicts
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: If you have no conflict of interests, please indicate "none".

Question.TranslatedText: Please indicate any conflict of interests you might have with the issue "insert here your topical target question":
